name: Fine Line Mine
description:
You and your trusty canary go deeper and deeper into the mine. Use your tools to mine the ore and collect the nuggets before you run out of oxygen!

Right click: change tool

Left click: use tool

Tools:

Lantern: Illuminates the area. Can also be used to light up the wall candles.

Pickaxe: Mines the gold ore. click until you break it but if you try to mine the nugget, you will lose it!

Hand: collects the gold nuggets. every 5 nuggets you regain 10% of your oxygen. 

A game for Ludum Dare 48 (Compo) 

Theme: Deeper and deeper 

Created by Opossum in a Jar (Spyridon Glarakis).

All music, art, and sfx by Spyridon Glarakis.

For a better audio experience, I'd recommend you to download the Windows version.
